review: I like it.  Really works slick.No problems setting it up or using it.Now videos are just a click of the remote away.
author: LDH

review: Why did we wait so long!
author: Mary Mccollough "Sabresister"

review: Excellent product. Has everything I use for home entertainment in one spot, with a user friendly interface.
author: Gwendolyn Burkhalter

review: So far, so good. I read through the other reviews and held my breath but no problems here. Now there are two! I do unplug it after each use because I don't know how much electricity it uses when on standby. The second stick couldn't fine the router signal but after moving the router, all is working. One step closer to cutting the cable!!
author: AnnCharlie

review: Love it,  clear sharp picture,  no lag experienced.
author: Jose Rodrigues

review: I really like the fire stick. It was easy to install and works well. The only problem so far is in the middle of a movie sometimes it will stop and tell me the internet connection has stopped working. Usually if I turn it off for several hours I can then watch the movie again later.
author: Colleen Lawson

review: Work as expected.  Easy assembly and easy to navigate.
author: VivLa
